channel.title: Log Out
channel.description:
Whenever I do a command like pickup, tele, or anything like that, it logs me out but when I log back in, I have that item or i teled to that place. On the CMD it shows this as the error: [code]java.lang.NullPointerException at client.logout(client.java:10715) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:376) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:368) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:281) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)[/code]
What should I do to fix it?

item.title: Log Out
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

Whenever I do a command like pickup, tele, or anything like that, it logs me out but when I log back in, I have that item or i teled to that place. On the CMD it shows this as the error:

java.lang.NullPointerException at client.logout(client.java:10715) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:376) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:368) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:281) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662)

What should I do to fix it?
